Reviews.Title: Marriage saver
Reviews.Author: lj
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my husband as he kayaks and is always asking to take my camera with him.  I have always refused because he has already drowned three phones and there was no way I was letting him near my camera.  The Olympus Tough is the perfect answer to our dilemma. It is waterproof and shockproof.  He has already taken it out on it's first kayak ride, dunked it below the water line and taken pictures.  He is very pleased and so am I.  The only problem is the buttons are very small and it took him some time to figure them all out and be able to use them.  He is already posting pictures he has taken to facebook.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Daniel F.
Reviews.Content: We bought this camera for takin on our honeymoon so that we could take it in the ocean and not worry about it at the beach or pools. This camera performed great. It took great underwater pictures and videos. It even got dropped around a bit and did not get damaged. I had a lot of fun trying out all the different settings this camera had to offer.The only downside is that the battery indicator is not very accurate. The battery itself had a great life as we only needed to charge it twice in the entire week (which we were constantly using it), but it went from half charged to dead on the meter in about an hour.I would definitely recommend this camera and for the price it's a great deal.

Reviews.Title: good buy
Reviews.Author: CHI
Reviews.Content: works pretty well, brought it to the pool, waterpart and took tons of pics and all pics looks great, good.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera - held up to snorkeling in Bora Bora
Reviews.Author: Erin E. Turowski
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to take on my honeymoon in Tahiti and Bora Bora, knowing that we would be taking a snorkeling trip with sharks and stingrays.  I was not disappointed!For a reasonable price, I got a snappy little camera that I can literally take anywhere.  I was pleasantly surprised to find that this camera has a 5X optical zoom (which is a nice feature in a waterproof point-and-shoot camera) and lots of nice pre-set modes.  I used the "pop art" and "HDR" modes a lot on vacation to capture some of the colors of the tropics.  The carrying case is nice, too - slim, sleek, and functional, with a handy wrist strap.But, if you are looking at this camera, you are probably the most curious about its underwater capabilities.  Well, this camera delivers!  I took so many GORGEOUS pictures of tropical fish underwater - this camera did an awesome job capturing colors and taking pictures in low light settings.  I recommend using the "beach" or "underwater" modes, because my underwater pictures in the "auto" mode came out a bit blurry.  The rest of the pictures were wonderful, though - I posted some sample images in the image gallery ( http://www.amazon.com/gp/customer-media/product-gallery/B00CYAZTTQ/ref=cm_cmu_up_thanks_hdr ).Overall, I really like this camera.  It is solid and reliable underwater, and it also takes great pictures on land.  I would definitely recommend it if you are looking for an affordable point-and-shoot underwater camera.

Reviews.Title: Only been a few weeks but very pleased
Reviews.Author: SFAGradStudent
Reviews.Content: I had an Olympus for 9 years and was very pleased with it, and the only reason it broke was because I dropped it.  This new camera (TG-620) seems to be of the same high quality.  My one negative so far is that it lacks a shutter to protect the lens (like my old Olympus) but the pictures so far have been very crisp.  For the price it was a steal.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: JoAnne Sayre
Reviews.Content: Camera seems to be tough as advertised.  However, case is very cheap and to floating device does not stay on the camera.

Reviews.Title: Terrific little camera!
Reviews.Author: Val Stinson
Reviews.Content: This little camera takes terrific pictures! It's easy to use, excellent photo quality, especially underwater!  The battery life is excellent! I doubt I'll ever take my SLR on a trip again!

Reviews.Title: Excellent underwater camera
Reviews.Author: TBS
Reviews.Content: This takes wonderful quality pics above and below water. easy operation.  great features and pre=programmed settings for scenes (which I used).  Can manually adjust settings.  LOVE this camera.  It was invaluable for our cruise to mexico, honduras, and belize.

Reviews.Title: Watch the latch
Reviews.Author: David Patterson
Reviews.Content: This item worked great until I used the carrying case. Was in the ocean and had the camera and case in my pocket. When I got the cam out of my pocket the secure latch had unlock. I suppose it was the rubber case because as long as I used the cam without the case I didnt have a problem with the lock. Sea water has ruined the camera and a camera shop that sell Olympus said there is no recovery.

Reviews.Title: It really is tough!
Reviews.Author: Moondrake
Reviews.Content: My best friend tends to destroy stuff that he carries around with him. He does lot of home improvement work at his place, my place and the homes of our friends, and everything in his pockets gets a real workout every day. He likes to carry a camera with him but his cameras were lasting only a couple of months. I bought him an Olympus Tough on EBay for his birthday two years ago and it is still going strong.  We have had it in the ocean many times, and aside from one painful glitch where it didn't recognize the SD card and he didn't realize it and we lost some unrecoverable memories, it has withstood everything he threw at it.

Reviews.Title: Ultimate Vacation camera for the price!
Reviews.Author: Joel D. Appler
Reviews.Content: I love this camera for several reason.  The new technology allows for much improved indoor shots, (they aren't brown anymore), and the HD video is priceless when you're kids are showing off their skills.  Most important features of this camera are the "tough" features.  It really does take tremendous shots and video six feet under water. ( I didn't go deeper because I was in a pool).  My son threw the camera out onto the pool deck and it did dent the edge around the flash.  The last camera I dropped was DOA.  This one continued working perfectly as if nothing happened.  Tough! I was so impressed I purchased a second for my wife.

Reviews.Title: I really enjoy this camera
Reviews.Author: louann jeffrey
Reviews.Content: I purchased the camera to go on a cruise with my family I have always wanted a waterproof shockproof camera I seen it on amazon.com and I thought it was a good price so I purchased it I received it before the expected time it was completely safe and protected nothing was damaged in the box everything was new the only downfall I have about the camera is the buttons are small and hard to figure out and also I fount the same item in retail stores like Best Buy and Target $20 to $15 cheaper but with that being said after I purchased it I keep it was not worth the 15 or 20 dollars to return it and I have enjoyed the camera every sense :)

Reviews.Title: Olympus waterproof camera
Reviews.Author: mary carpenter
Reviews.Content: The camera was a gift for my Daughter in Colorado, who bikes, hikes, kayaks, etc in the beautiful scenery of the Rocky Mountains and she seemed pleased and I feel she will use it a lot.  I was a little disappointed that a film disc was not included.  Otherwise I was completely satisfied.  Thank you.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera
Reviews.Author: Nick Piesco
Reviews.Content: For the price it is a very good camera.  I haven't used it underwater yet.  I love the macro feature.  The main problem with this camera is the difficulty of using the small function button.  It takes a lot of finesse for a bumble fingers like me. The other problem is my desire to have the lens centered in the camera body.  That also takes some experience. Luckily you can shoot away and get all the experience you need with little cost. For the price I am not dissatisfied with my purpose.

Reviews.Title: Awesome camera!
Reviews.Author: Kevin Esposito
Reviews.Content: Took it on a mission trip to El Salvador.  Hot, humid weather but the pictures were great.  Very very clear.  Good color.  The camera has lots of fun features and was easy to learn to use.  No downside.  Price is right too!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Capt.Roger
Reviews.Content: I have had many digital cameras. I use them in Real Estate taking pictures of foreclosures and the work being done to inspect and clean, winterize and dewinterize them. The Olympus Tough series cameras are the only ones that have held up for me. I can take anywhere from a hundred to a thousand pictures in one day. The cameras get dropped occasionally and have held up under the changes in temperatures here in Wisconsin, taking pictures in sub zero temperatures one minute and back into warm indoors can take its toll. Tried many other brands, but this being my second one of this series has taught me not to buy or try other brands again. Great camera!

Reviews.Title: Outstanding camera
Reviews.Author: Matt Nelson
Reviews.Content: This has wonderful settings, is easy to use and takes beautiful underwater images and video! Couldn't be happier with a purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: MCooke
Reviews.Content: I got this to take pictures in Cancun this summer, and it's a winner!Pictures are very clear, and I took a bunch underwater.  No problems yet.Easy to load the pics onto my computer with the cable provided with it.I checked out a bunch of underwater camera reviews and priced out a few on Amazon.  For the price and the quality, this was definitely the best.Rechargeable by plugging the cable into my computer.  Very easy to use.I'm on my way to Puerto Rico to take more pics with it this week!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: Donald Smith
Reviews.Content: This camera takes in my opinion spectacular images.This is my first digital camera and I am impressed.Low light or dramatic back light images are excellent!Fits in your pocket take it anywhere.16:9l and 16:9s mode WILL impress you.In this mode I have had multiple wall paper shots on my pc I just cant match with My dslr Nikon 5200 shooting raw developed in lightroom5!Also I have dropped this thing once.No problem.And you can take pics of course in the rain!Its good to 16 feet underwater!This thing is a no brain er for any one looking for great pics and great concealment.

Reviews.Title: A great camera for underwater photos
Reviews.Author: Yachtwork
Reviews.Content: I love these cameras. I have been through about five now because we use them on our charter boat. Guests can be pretty tough on them and they keep on ticking. The worst thing about them is the two second between photos lag time. The best thing is the high quality video and that the camera will zoom during video. Not all do so check on this. It makes the camera much more functional. I use these all the time in salt water and they keep working.

Reviews.Title: Great outdoor waterproof camera
Reviews.Author: Ronald Thompson
Reviews.Content: I use this camera for kayak fishing. Takes great pictures. Waterproof and rugged. I find it easy to operate, though the buttons are a bit small.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Camera!!
Reviews.Author: Shannon
Reviews.Content: Absolutely amazing under water camera!  Worth every penny!  Bought it before my trip to Australia where I went snorkeling and scuba diving at the Great Barrier Reef.  This camera took amazing pictures on land and under water and never gave me any problems.  The battery lasted a long time too.  I had it on all day and it took pictures from dawn until dusk.  I highly recommend this camera for your under water picture needs.  The floating hand strap was also a fantastic addition and really handy!

Reviews.Title: This camera is one of the best purchases I have ever made.
Reviews.Author: Diana Gundacker
Reviews.Content: This camera is AMAZING! I was on the fence about purchasing this camera for our honeymoon to swim with the sea turtles. I finally decided to buy it as a gift for my husband. This camera not only worked extremely well for all of the underwater shots, it also became our primary camera for all of our land shots as well. It shoots really quickly with no delay and the photos come out very clear. I would recommend this camera to anyone who is looking for an underwater or regular camera. I also recommend purchasing it in the kit that comes with the case and floatation device. It was so easy to throw the camera to my husband as he was snorkeling to catch a shot I couldn't get and not worry about the camera sinking to the bottom of the ocean.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Lina S.
Reviews.Content: We used this camera in our last trip to cancun, and all our pictures are amazing.  Excellent quality for a good price!!

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Matt
Reviews.Content: Worked great, picture quality was better the excepted.  Spent 5 days in the ocean with it and didn't have any problems

Reviews.Title: Great Easy to use camera
Reviews.Author: Nirali Patel
Reviews.Content: I needed a waterproof camera for a beach vacation and I decided to buy one 3 days before we left.  Without a lot of research I trusted the reviews from Amazon and made an impulse purchase.  I LOVE this camera.  It's very easy to use in and out of water.  The quality of pictures from this is amazing.  I would highly recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: D. Patchen
Reviews.Content: The pictures were great in and out of the water.  The pictures under the water were so clear, you could even see the bottom of the sea.

Reviews.Title: Very satisfied with this camera
Reviews.Author: William Shirah
Reviews.Content: Truly waterproof!!  Used it from my JetSki, in and under the water.. the camera really took a beating!  I recommend this camera for anybody on vacation in and around water!!

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the money!
Reviews.Author: Marsha Kloker
Reviews.Content: Even though I do not intend to use this camera underwater, I bought it to stand up to the rigors of my home inspection business, which exposes a camera to dirt, water, and shock.  This is my third camera for the business in 6 years.  The first one got dropped, and worked no more.  The second one got too much dirt in the zoom lense mechanism and died.  The Olmpus has no externally telescoping parts for the zoom and is performing very well.  Have had the camera for about two months, and would recommend the "Tough" for harsh environments.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Gail
Reviews.Content: Great camera. Should get an extra battery.Photos and video under water look great. Easy to use. Recommend it for snorkeling.

Reviews.Title: Great for water activities!
Reviews.Author: Julia R.
Reviews.Content: Bought for a trip where we would be on/in the water every day, it was great!  Between boats/snorkeling/fishing/swimming I didn't have to worry about it getting splashed or submerged or dropped on the boat deck.  Took great pictures as well with lots of features (love the panorama options!).  Battery lasted good amount of time as well once I put it on "power save" mode.  Only negative is after submerging it sometimes there would be a little foggy spot on the lens (couldn't wipe it off) for a few minutes so you had to wait to take more pics or the fog spot was on them.

Reviews.Title: Enjoying the waterproof camera!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: The buttons and controls are easy to use under water. The only negative for the camera is the view screen under water. It isn't always clear what your taking a picture of. However, I took about 200 pictures and the majority of these were underwater. Only 2 or 3 pictures were blurry or didn't turn out that good. I believe I didn't focus the camera (clicking halfway and receiving the green box in the viewer screen). I took pictures anywhere from 3 to 12 feet deep.It takes consecutive pictures pretty quickly.  The battery is still strong and its the same one that came with the camera. I also took several videos and they turn out great! It fits easily in your pocket.It's a great little camera.

Reviews.Title: great camera so far
Reviews.Author: xdwright
Reviews.Content: great camera so far, have only had it a couple of months, and have not had it underwater yet...so I am not sure how waterproof it is...but it takes good pictures and good video

Reviews.Title: perfect for boating
Reviews.Author: Richard Fekecs
Reviews.Content: I bought this for boating, and its perfect. Photos come out better than I expected them to. So far its a great camera for water activities!

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Photoboy
Reviews.Content: This camera is definitely made for water. All doors have safety locks and the camera even reminds you to check that they are locked. I took some bright colorful pics with it.  The only downside about this, or any other camera is, you have to make sure lens is clean when you take a picture out of the water or there will be spots on the pics. Lesson learned.

Reviews.Title: Amazing quality - great shots on land and in water
Reviews.Author: ThinkingOutside
Reviews.Content: Couldn't be more pleased with this purchase. We decided to get a camera dedicated to underwater photo for the Galapagos. It seems we also got a great point and shot for all sorts of uses. Quality is better than our new SLR in a few cases.  Buttons are in odd places which can make one accidently take a video or change modes or turn the camera off - and even with that, we are happy, so it must be good.

Reviews.Title: Buttons to small
Reviews.Author: ANNE OLSON
Reviews.Content: Great functionality. Like it a lot. But the main button is to small. I have to use my finger nails to operate.

Reviews.Title: Takes a nice photo and can take a bath while doing it..
Reviews.Author: Jared W Duffy
Reviews.Content: I purchased this as a gift for a friend going to Hawaii and she loves it.  The quality of the photos is very good and because it is water proof she didn't fear bringing it out to the beach with her.  For the cost in comparison with the quality of the photos, it is a big win.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera Package
Reviews.Author: James Crowder
Reviews.Content: This camera is compact and tough. It is perfect for my hunting and fishing trips. The XD Card does not come with the package. I added the 16gb card and now have storage for some 5,000 pictures.

Reviews.Title: The best to travel.
Reviews.Author: Veronica Vasquez
Reviews.Content: It's excelent in all, quality, weight, size, sharpness. I think so is perfect camera for to travel, and the best are photos underwater and easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Daughter loved her gift
Reviews.Author: Skeeter
Reviews.Content: She will be going on a cruise next week and will test it out!  Delivery was perfect and on time.  Like the fact it came with case, which looked like a hard case in the pix.  Very sturdy float bracelet included too.  Add a few $$ and include the SB card to make sure the right one is purchased.

Reviews.Title: Olympus TG-620 iHS Waterproof digital camera
Reviews.Author: EJQ828
Reviews.Content: Awesome. My kids and I had a lot of fun on vacation with my Olympus TG-620 Tough iHS waterproof camera. Great underwater shots. Great memories.

Reviews.Title: great buy
Reviews.Author: Rob
Reviews.Content: This is the third time I've bought this camera. 1st one was ruined because kids used it in the pool and did not make sure the battery door was locked shut.2nd one was taken on a canoe trip and lost in the river when we tipped over.So hopefully this third one its a charm as the phone takes great pics and works great. Just always check door locks and get floatable strap to keep it from sinking to the bottom of lake etc. ooh and download pics often as we lost are whole summer of pics with the last camera.

Reviews.Title: excellent product.
Reviews.Author: VE261913 JOSE ALVAREZ
Reviews.Content: I chose the Olympus Tough TG-620 Waterproof Digital Camera iHS because it seemed sturdy and always go with my family to the island the Roques in Venezuela. excellent price. the ulilicé and your photos and videos seen spectacular HD tv 42 ". excellent product.Caracas-Venezuela

Reviews.Title: good camera
Reviews.Author: dugan m
Reviews.Content: nice little camera takes good pictures ,battery last  hours ,takes good videos  nice and com packed the float came in handed

Reviews.Title: Great photos & video
Reviews.Author: Karyl Allen
Reviews.Content: Even without using the "water" setting, the pics we took at the outdoor pool were clear and sharp.  The pics we took away from water were comparable to my non-waterproof digital camera.  Probably the only negative thing I can say about the camera is that the wrist strap on the camera itself is not adjustable.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: AGreene
Reviews.Content: This camera has exceeded my expectations! I bought it to use with my children at water parks, in the pool, canoe trips and snorkeling. Not only did it take great pictures under water, but also above the water. We have been very happy with this product.

Reviews.Title: Complete camera kit plus floater and carrying pouch.
Reviews.Author: crazylady
Reviews.Content: We bought a memory card separately...that's it.  The camera box came with USB cord, battery, charger, and another cord (maybe to the TV), and a CD.  In the shipping box was the boxed camera kit, and the pouch and floating strap.  We love the way the camera looks.  We have yet to try it.

Reviews.Title: Waterproof Camera
Reviews.Author: L. Shaffer
Reviews.Content: This camera is a gift for my daughter for Christmas. It came very quickly, and it looks very nice, but I don't know yet what kind of pictures it takes.

Reviews.Title: Complicated
Reviews.Author: John Harrington
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is very good and it seems to be very durable.  However, the instructions are not clear and I'm still working through its operations.

Reviews.Title: Cheap and proprietary charger -
Reviews.Author: AGoodfriend "AGoodfriend"
Reviews.Content: Will never have a chance to test the camera - it comes with a proprietary USB charging cable which requires yet 1 more cable to travel with the lose and not be able to do anything until you fork over another $40 and wait.  None of the Sony, Nikon or Fuji products have this shortcoming.The camera may be OK, but when you look at the price and see what you get, something has to give.  Too bad it's the quality.

ProductInfo.Features:
Waterproof to 16ft
Shockproof to 5ft
Freeze proof to 14F
ProductInfo.Name: Olympus TG-620 Tough iHS Waterproof Digital Camera (Blue) with Case and Float Strap
